禁止智能手机和社交媒体访问无法保护儿童免受数字伤害当今BMJ的一群国际专家认为，仅禁止智能手机和社交媒体访问无法使儿童健康使用技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/banning-smartphone-and-social-social-media-access-fails-to-protect-children-children-from-digital-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/banning-smartphone-and-social-social-media-access-fails-fails-to-protect-children-children-from-digital-harm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f88620fe-012D-44B8-8E02-2FE3155161B1 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 22:58:22 -0400 Banning smartphone and social media access fails to protect children from digital harm
研究指出单呼吸病毒是川崎疾病的原因芝加哥Ann＆Robert H. Lurie儿童医院的Stanley Manne儿童研究所的研究强烈表明，川崎疾病是由一种尚未确定的单一呼吸道病毒引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/study-points-to-single-single-respiratory-virus-virus-as-cause-cause-of-kawasaki-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/study-points-points-to-single-respiratory-virus-virus-virus-as-cause-of-kawasaki-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd00d9a2-f93e-4f57-b912-b912-ddbd969d19d1fe Thu, 27 Mar 2025 22:55:03 -0400 Study points to single respiratory virus as cause of Kawasaki disease
开创性研究揭示了调节细胞行为的新途径细胞膜蛋白隐藏可用于修改细胞行为的秘密网关。这在由医院Del Mar研究所领导的一项研究中证明了这一点，并在自然通讯中发表，并从西班牙，瑞士，英国，德国，法国，波兰，荷兰，荷兰，丹麦，匈牙利，意大利，史威登，史威登，中国，中国和美国的研究中心参与。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/groundBreaking-Study-reveals-new-new-pathways-to-modulate-codulate-cell-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/groundbreaking-study-reveals-new-pathways-to-modulate-colluals-cell-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89a19fc8-9858-4c0a-9019-3beede604075 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 22:49:25 -0400 Groundbreaking study reveals new pathways to modulate cell behavior
